<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1965]]''' - The fourteenth episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[2003]]''' - The Brazilian Tolkien society [[Heren Hyarmen]] changes its name to "Heren Hyarmeno".
* '''[[2004]]''' - ''The Times Literary Supplement'' publishes "Not Worn Lightly", [[Tom Shippey]]'s review of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
